detaileddescription.para: Service changed client characteristic configuration descriptor
List of characteristics to be discovered; order matches handle index enumeration

briefdescription.para: Perform service and characteristic discovery for GATT service. Parameter pHdlList must point to an array of length GATT_HDL_LIST_LEN. If discovery is successful the handles of discovered characteristics and descriptors will be set in pHdlList.

detaileddescription.para: Perform service and characteristic discovery for GATT service. Note that pHdlList must point to an array of handles of length GATT_HDL_LIST_LEN. If discovery is successful the handles of discovered characteristics and descriptors will be set in pHdlList.

briefdescription.para: Process a value received in an ATT read response, notification, or indication message. Parameter pHdlList must point to an array of length GATT_HDL_LIST_LEN. If the attribute handle of the message matches a handle in the handle list the value is processed, otherwise it is ignored.

detaileddescription.para: Process a value received in an ATT read response, notification, or indication message. Parameter pHdlList must point to an array of length GATT_HDL_LIST_LEN. If the attribute handle of the message matches a handle in the handle list the value is processed, otherwise it is ignored.

simplesect.para: ATT_SUCCESS if handle is found, ATT_ERR_NOT_FOUND otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Set Index of the Service Changed CCCD in the ATT Server.

parameterdescription.para: Index of the Service Changed CCCD in the ATT Server.

briefdescription.para: Send Service Change Indications to the specified connections if they are configured to do so.

parameterdescription.para: DM Connection identifier or DM_CONN_ID_NONE to send to all connections.
start handle for service changed value.
end handle for service changed value.

memberdef.argsstring: (dmConnId_t connId, uint16_t handle, uint8_t operation, uint16_t offset, attsAttr_t *pAttr)
